h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Loong Scales Location
content: The Loong Scales are found in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair in a secret area after defeating the First Prince of Flowing Sands and having the boss destroy the mural wall in the arena.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Scales.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Scales', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Loong Scales Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Loong Scales are found in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair in a secret area after defeating the First Prince of Flowing Sands and having the boss destroy the mural wall in the arena.
